channel.title: Alaris - Fun Eco
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.alaris.org/banner.gif[/img]
[B]Links[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/play"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/Alaris.jar"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/vote"]Vote[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/hiscores"]Hiscores[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/forums"]Forums[/URL]
[B]Intro[/B]
Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 17 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.
[B]Features[/B]
Deep Wildy Bosses Plenty of Bosses Fun Economy NPC\Player Clipping Completionist Cape + Achievements Gambler NPC (Gamble Vote points and Gold) Mithril seeds IPB forums Auto Vote Hiscores Login Tutorial Quick Prayers Plenty of Npcs to fight A few customs Custom Pirate Minigame Fast Leveling & More come check us out

[B]Intro[/B]

Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 17 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.

[B]Features[/B]

Deep Wildy Bosses
Plenty of Bosses
Fun Economy
NPC\Player Clipping
Completionist Cape + Achievements
